io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

Interface BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier, BlockLootProviderBase.LootModifier, BlockLootProviderBase.StandaloneLootFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockLootProviderBase.WrappedLootEntry
    Enclosing class:
    BlockLootProviderBase
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory
    Interface to get a loot entry from a block.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.minecraft.loot.LootEntry.Builder<?> build(net.minecraft.block.Block block) 
      static BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory from(net.minecraft.loot.LootEntry.Builder<?> builder)
      Gets a loot factory that will always return the given loot entry.
      static BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory[] from(net.minecraft.loot.LootEntry.Builder<?>[] builders)
      Gets an array of loot factories that will always return the given loot entries.
      static net.minecraft.loot.LootEntry.Builder<?>[] resolve(net.minecraft.block.Block b, BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory[] factories)
      Calls build on all factories with the given block and returns a new array.
      default BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory with(net.minecraft.loot.conditions.ILootCondition.IBuilder... conditions)
